Sentencas: This study deals with the changes in the electrical and optical properties of Sm2Ti2O7 due to the substitution of 25 wt% of Zr with Ti.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: Nanocrystalline Sm2Ti2O7 and Sm2Ti1.5Zr0.5O7, with cubic pyrochlore structure, are prepared through the modified combustion technique.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) is used to find the structure and confirmed using vibrational spectroscopic tools.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: The particle size obtained for Sm2Ti2O7 using the transmission electron microscopic technique (TEM) is 12.74 nm.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: The band gap energy values of Sm2Ti2O7 are 3.33 eV and for Sm2Ti1.5Zr0.5O7 it is 3.47 eV.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: The photoluminescence (PL) spectroscopic studies give emission around 569 nm.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: The average grain size obtained using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) is 0.13 mu m and 0.27 mu m for Sm2Ti2O7 and Sm2Ti1.5Zr0.5O7, respectively.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: The conductivity is increased with temperature and high conductivity of 2.27 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate
Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate

Sentencas: These materials are found suitable for optical and solid oxide fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Structure and properties of pure and zirconium substituted nanocrystalline samarium titanate
